resources.string: "1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner \"D/D\" monsters\n" + "During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card on the field; that target has its effects negated, until the next Standby Phase. You can only use this effect of \"D/D/D Cursed King Siegfried\" once per turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Gain 1000 LP for each \"Dark Contract\" card you control.",
